snippet: Security agents at American airports have confiscated more than 800 guns so far in 2013, setting a pace that is likely to beat last year’s record of 1,556.
abstract: Security agents at American airports have confiscated more than 800 guns from travelers so far in 2013, setting a pace that is likely to beat 2012 record of 1,556; nation's busiest airport Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International has dubious record of most gun seizures by Transportation Security Administration, with 67 to date.
lead_paragraph: Security agents at American airports have confiscated more than 800 guns so far in 2013, setting a pace that is likely to beat last year’s record of 1,556.

headline.main: An Odd Crown for Atlanta: Most Guns at the Airport
headline.print_headline: Odd Crown For Atlanta: Most Guns At Airport
